data.eml:eml: Descriptions of two new leafhopper species of the genus Flaviata Lu & Qin (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae) from Southern China, with a key to known species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Ye, Lu, Sihan, Dietrich, Christopher H., Qin, Daozheng (2018): Descriptions of two new leafhopper species of the genus Flaviata Lu & Qin (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae) from Southern China, with a key to known species. Zootaxa 4457 (4): 577-582, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4457.4.7
